title: Israel Says Hit Hezbollah Intel Headquarters In Syria Strike
content: Israel's military said its air force struck the intelligence headquarters of Hezbollah's Syrian branch in a strike on Damascus on Monday, an attack a war monitor said killed two people.
summary: Israel's military said its air force struck the intelligence headquarters of Hezbollah's Syrian branch in a strike on Damascus on Monday, an attack a war monitor said killed two people.

title: Kamala Harris' Ancestral Village In India Prays For Her Election Win
content: Residents in US Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris' ancestral village in southern India were preparing to hold prayers on election day on Tuesday in a Hindu temple more than 8,000 miles (13,000 km) from Washington.
summary: Residents in US Democratic presidential candidate Kamala Harris' ancestral village in southern India were preparing to hold prayers on election day on Tuesday in a Hindu temple more than 8,000 miles (13,000 km) from Washington.

title: This New Update On X Allows Blocked Users To View Your Public Posts
content: Elon Musk-run X social media platform has started to launch an update that will allow people you've blocked to continue to see your posts and your followers' lists.
summary: Elon Musk-run X social media platform has started to launch an update that will allow people you've blocked to continue to see your posts and your followers' lists.

title: The US Election By Numbers
content: Swing states, electoral college votes, candidates up and down the ballot, and millions of potential voters: Here is the US election, broken down by numbers.
summary: Swing states, electoral college votes, candidates up and down the ballot, and millions of potential voters: Here is the US election, broken down by numbers.

title: The Seven States That Will Decide The US Presidency
content: And in the handful of critical states framing the 2024 race, there is little daylight between the rivals with barely a week before Election Day.
summary: And in the handful of critical states framing the 2024 race, there is little daylight between the rivals with barely a week before Election Day.

title: Trump-Harris Showdown Revives Debate On US' Electoral College
content: When political outsider Donald Trump defied polls and expectations to defeat Hillary Clinton in the 2016 US presidential election, he described the victory as "beautiful."
summary: When political outsider Donald Trump defied polls and expectations to defeat Hillary Clinton in the 2016 US presidential election, he described the victory as "beautiful."

title: Axe Attack On Paris Train Leaves 4 Teens Injured
content: Four teens were wounded, two of them seriously, by an axe wielded during a fight on Monday on a suburban train outside Paris, police sources said, with the main suspect later arrested.
summary: Four teens were wounded, two of them seriously, by an axe wielded during a fight on Monday on a suburban train outside Paris, police sources said, with the main suspect later arrested.

title: Is The US Presidential Election A Battle Of The Sexes?
content: Historically speaking, women have leaned towards voting for Democrats more than men have, since the 1980s and this gap has only grown wider since.
summary: Historically speaking, women have leaned towards voting for Democrats more than men have, since the 1980s and this gap has only grown wider since.

title: Russia To Launch Two Private Iranian Satellites Into Orbit
content: A Russian rocket will launch two privately built Iranian satellites into orbit early Tuesday, the Iranian embassy in Moscow said, hailing close space cooperation between Moscow and Tehran.
summary: A Russian rocket will launch two privately built Iranian satellites into orbit early Tuesday, the Iranian embassy in Moscow said, hailing close space cooperation between Moscow and Tehran.

title: Trump Says He Would Not Mind Somebody 'Shooting' At Him Through Fake News
content: Having survived two assassination attempts this summer, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Sunday suggested that he would not mind if somebody took a shot at him through fake news.
summary: Having survived two assassination attempts this summer, Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump on Sunday suggested that he would not mind if somebody took a shot at him through fake news.

title: Maldives Recalls Diplomat In Pak Over Unauthorised Meet With Taliban Envoy
content: The Maldives recalled its top diplomat in Pakistan, official sources said Monday, after he had an unauthorised meeting with an Afghan envoy in Islamabad.
summary: The Maldives recalled its top diplomat in Pakistan, official sources said Monday, after he had an unauthorised meeting with an Afghan envoy in Islamabad.

title: Israel's Use Of Air Launched Ballistic Missile On Iran Draws Interest
content: Israel's effective use of air-launched ballistic missiles in its airstrikes against Iran is expected to pique interest elsewhere in acquiring the weapons, which most major powers have avoided in favour of cruise missiles and glide bombs.
summary: Israel's effective use of air-launched ballistic missiles in its airstrikes against Iran is expected to pique interest elsewhere in acquiring the weapons, which most major powers have avoided in favour of cruise missiles and glide bombs.

title: "I'm A Product Of Poverty": Cardi B Slams Elon Musk Over 'Puppet' Remark
content: "Another puppet who can't even talk without being fed the words," Mr Musk said in a tweet.
summary: "Another puppet who can't even talk without being fed the words," Mr Musk said in a tweet.

title: Pak Ex PM Imran Khan's Wife Breaks Down In Tears During Court Proceedings
content: A court in Pakistan on Monday witnessed emotional scenes when jailed former premier Imran Khan's wife Bushra Bibi burst into tears, expressing her utter helplessness against the inefficient justice system and her husband's "unjust sentencing".
summary: A court in Pakistan on Monday witnessed emotional scenes when jailed former premier Imran Khan's wife Bushra Bibi burst into tears, expressing her utter helplessness against the inefficient justice system and her husband's "unjust sentencing".

title: Skeleton Found In French Home, Likely Of Owner Missing Since 2009
content: New owners renovating a house in eastern France made the shock discovery of a human skeleton that are likely that of a former owner who vanished 15 years ago, prosecutors said Monday.
summary: New owners renovating a house in eastern France made the shock discovery of a human skeleton that are likely that of a former owner who vanished 15 years ago, prosecutors said Monday.

title: Watch: Trump's Dance Moves On Hit Track 'YMCA' At Georgia Rally
content: Former US President and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump capped off his rally in Georgia by dancing to the classic hit 'YMCA'.

title: Iran Woman Who Stripped At University Not Seen Since. What We Know
content: Two days back, a young Iranian woman took the Internet by storm when she stripped to her underwear on a Tehran university campus, apparently to protest against the country's strict dress code for women.

title: Israel Denies Carrying Out Strikes On Polio Vaccination Clinic In Gaza
content: The Israeli military denied on Monday that it had hit a clinic in the northern Gaza Strip where health workers were carrying out polio vaccinations.
summary: The Israeli military denied on Monday that it had hit a clinic in the northern Gaza Strip where health workers were carrying out polio vaccinations.
